items.summary: Explore AI in education through a SPIKE Prime robot that adapts with feedback to hit targets. RoboCamp shows how students can understand AI learning by programming without new hardware. Discover the hands-on approach RoboCamp advocates.

LEGO Education unveils new AI sets while extending SPIKE Prime and Essential's availability till mid-2026. Students have time to continue their projects with current kits while educators await reviews of new offerings.
Celebrate six years of innovation with SPIKE Prime! Discover how 3D printing and laser cutting enhance creativity in robotics, turning every lesson into a limitless adventure driven by imagination.
Dive into a Cosmic Battle in the classroom! With SPIKE Essential, students 6-9 can build starfighters and learn coding through exhilarating sci-fi duels shaped by chance, sparking curiosity.
Should you integrate 3D printing into your robotics classes? Weigh creative freedom against the logistics of using 3D printers in lessons with RoboCamp's SPIKE Prime activities.
Transform nostalgia into education with SPIKE Prime. Students can now relive classic games like Snake and Arkanoid, learning Python and game mechanics while building robots.
Create a moving owl with the Flying Bird project! Using SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and a laser cutter, students visualize mechanical principles and design skills through engaging, hands-on learning.
Capture students' attention with the Carousel project, illustrating centrifugal force! This hands-on activity connects physics with LEGO sets, offering a memorable educational experience.
Unlock creativity in students with eight dynamic robotics projects using SPIKE Prime and mBot 2. From cranes to carousels, enhance lessons and spark imagination with these innovative tools!
Revisit gaming classics with SPIKE Prime and Python. In our course, kids build robots and recreate Snake & Arkanoid, learning programming fundamentals and fostering a passion for tech.

Teach centrifugal force with the Carousel model, designed for SPIKE Prime or mBot 2. Students witness physics in action, gaining a deeper understanding through hands-on experience and laser-cut precision.
Turn classical childhood wonder into education with eight new robot projects. Use SPIKE Prime and mBot 2 with a laser cutter to build cranes, carousels, and more for engaging lessons.

Engage young minds with Cosmic Battle! Build iconic starfighters and enjoy sci-fi duels using SPIKE Essential. This hands-on activity teaches coding and robotics, sparking creativity in students aged 6-9.
Students build a functional anemometer with SPIKE Prime and a 3D-printed propeller, integrating STEM concepts and real-world data collection. Perfect for innovative classroom sessions!
Explore mechanical principles using LEGO SPIKE Prime and mBot 2 in the Moving Owl project. Enhance learning with laser-cut elements, teaching design and crank mechanics engagingly.
